metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26847 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
SPIP before 3.2.14 and 4.x before 4.0.5 allows unauthenticated access to information about editorial objects.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-26847` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

spip - 4.1.5+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spip package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.5+dfsg-1').
